ABOUT_ME_TEXT: I am a highly motivated, German-speaking Junior Frontend Developer from Eitorf (North Rhine-Westphalia). I focus on careful planning, clean code and thorough documentation to ensure high-quality work. Teamwork and a strong work ethic come naturally to me. The ability to quickly learn new tasks and find solutions to problems complements my profile. If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!
PORTFOLIO_NOTICE: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
PROJECT_JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Task Manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECT_EL_POLLO_LOCO_DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
